title: Undo a Commit
description: Git is a powerful version control system that allows developers to track changes to their codebase. One of the most useful features of Git is the ability to undo changes that have been committed. In this lab, you will learn how to undo a commit using Git.

meta.title: Undo a Commit in Git
meta.description: Learn how to undo a commit in Git, a powerful version control system, and restore your codebase to a previous state.
meta.keywords: version control, revert commit, git labs, git revert, git, git playground, undo commit

verify.name: Verify the success of the undo
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
